title: ollama-cli (go-llama.cpp wrapper)
summary: Built-in Go CLI that wraps llama.cpp for fast CPU/GGUF inference.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, pull, and manage models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; streaming chat support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, PDF, RAG, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with streaming, embeddings, and custom timeout support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, pull, and list models idiomatically.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code plugin using Ollama models locally.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to run Ollama generators and embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks (CPU/GPU) for easy deployment.

title: ollama-helm-chart
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-rag-langchain-tutorial
summary: Step-by-step repo showing RAG with Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma locally.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Simple Discord.py bot that chats with Ollama models privately or in servers.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local Ollama models into channels/DMs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin for AI-assisted writing using Ollama.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Open PR/discussion to pull Hugging Face models directly into Ollama.
